Name: Define product vision and success metrics
Notes:
This is a critical foundational task that will guide all subsequent work on the mobile app redesign. We need to clearly articulate what success looks like for this project, including key performance indicators (KPIs) such as user engagement rates, conversion metrics, and customer satisfaction scores.

The vision document should cover:
1. Target user personas and their pain points
2. Competitive analysis summary
3. Feature prioritization framework
4. Success metrics with specific targets
5. Timeline milestones

Stakeholders to consult: Product team, Engineering leads, Customer Success, Marketing

Name: Conduct user research interviews
Notes:
Schedule and conduct 15-20 user interviews across different segments:
- Power users (5-6 interviews)
- Casual users (5-6 interviews)
- Churned users (3-4 interviews)
- Prospective users (3-4 interviews)

Each interview should follow the discussion guide and be recorded for later analysis. Key themes to explore include navigation difficulties, feature discoverability, and mobile-specific pain points.

Name: Create wireframes for new navigation
Notes: Based on user research findings, design new navigation patterns that address the top 5 usability issues identified. Consider both bottom navigation and hamburger menu patterns. Must support accessibility requirements (WCAG 2.1 AA).
Blocking (Dependencies): Define product vision and success metrics

Name: Set up CI/CD pipeline for mobile builds
Notes:
Configure automated build and deployment pipeline:
- iOS builds via Xcode Cloud or Fastlane
- Android builds via Gradle
- Automated testing on each PR
- Beta distribution via TestFlight/Firebase App Distribution
- Code signing and certificate management

Name: Design new onboarding flow
Notes: Create a streamlined onboarding experience that reduces time-to-value. Current onboarding has a 40% drop-off rate - target is to reduce this to under 20%. Include progressive disclosure and skip options for experienced users.

Name: Audit current codebase for technical debt
Implement dark mode support
Notes: Add system-level dark mode support with manual override option. Ensure all color tokens are properly themed and test on various devices. This is a frequently requested feature with over 500 user requests in the feedback system.

Name: Refactor authentication module
Notes: The current auth module is tightly coupled and difficult to test. Refactor to use dependency injection and add support for biometric authentication (Face ID, Touch ID, fingerprint). Security audit required before deployment.

Name: Build new dashboard widgets
Notes:
Implement the 6 new dashboard widgets as specified in the design mockups:
1. Activity summary chart
2. Quick actions panel
3. Recent items carousel
4. Progress tracker
5. Notification center preview
6. Personalized recommendations

Each widget should be independently testable and support skeleton loading states.

Name: Implement offline mode
Notes: Add offline support using local SQLite database with background sync. Handle conflict resolution for data modified offline. This is essential for users with intermittent connectivity.

Name: Design system color palette update
Notes: Update color palette to meet WCAG 2.1 AA contrast requirements. Current palette fails contrast checks on 12 color combinations. New palette should support both light and dark modes.

Name: Performance optimization - image loading
Notes: Implement lazy loading, progressive image loading, and WebP format support. Target: reduce initial load time by 40% and cut data usage by 30%. Current baseline measurements documented in the performance dashboard.

Name: Write unit tests for cart module
API versioning strategy
Notes: Implement API versioning to support gradual rollout of new endpoints while maintaining backward compatibility. Use URL path versioning (v1, v2) with deprecation headers for old endpoints.

Name: Push notification improvements
Notes: Enhance push notifications with rich media support, action buttons, and improved targeting. Add user preference controls for notification categories. Test across iOS and Android platforms.

Name: Accessibility audit and fixes
Notes: Complete accessibility audit using Axe, VoiceOver, and TalkBack. Document all issues and implement fixes for P0 and P1 items. Ensure screen reader compatibility and keyboard navigation support.

Name: Search functionality redesign
Notes:
New search implementation with:
- Autocomplete suggestions
- Recent searches
- Voice search support
- Filter chips
- Search results with highlighted terms

Testing focus: response time (<200ms), relevance ranking, and handling of edge cases (special characters, very long queries, empty results).

Name: User settings page redesign
Notes: Reorganized settings page with improved information architecture. Grouped related settings, added search within settings, and improved labels based on user feedback.

Name: Error handling standardization
Notes: Standardize error messages and handling across the app. Create consistent error UI components with actionable messages. Implement proper error logging and crash reporting integration.

Name: Memory leak fixes
Notes:
Fixed 3 memory leaks identified in the performance audit:
1. Image cache not clearing on low memory warning
2. Event listeners not removed on view controller dealloc
3. Circular reference in notification observers

All fixes validated with Instruments profiling.

Name: Localization for 5 new languages
Notes: Added support for: Japanese, Korean, Portuguese (BR), Polish, and Turkish. All strings reviewed by native speakers. RTL support verified for future Arabic/Hebrew additions.

Name: Set up crash reporting
Notes: Implemented Crashlytics for iOS and Android with custom keys for debugging. Set up alerts for crash rate thresholds. Dashboard configured for the team.

Name: Define API contracts
Notes: OpenAPI 3.0 specification completed for all 47 endpoints. Includes request/response schemas, authentication requirements, and example payloads. Published to internal API portal.

Name: Database migration script
Notes: Migration script for schema changes supporting new features. Includes rollback capability and data validation. Tested on staging with production data copy.

Name: Security penetration testing
Notes: Third-party penetration test completed. 2 medium and 5 low severity issues identified and remediated. Final report approved by security team.

Name: Competitor analysis report
Notes: Comprehensive analysis of 8 competitor apps covering: feature comparison, UX patterns, pricing models, and user reviews analysis. Key insights incorporated into product roadmap.

Name: Button component - implement variants
Notes: Create primary secondary and tertiary button variants with loading and disabled states.

Name: Toast notification component
Notes: Implement toast notifications with auto-dismiss, action buttons, and queue management for multiple simultaneous toasts.

Name: Write E2E tests - login flow
Notes:
Automated end-to-end tests for:
- Email/password login
- Social login (Google, Apple, Facebook)
- Forgot password flow
- Session persistence
- Logout

Name: Performance baseline documentation
Notes:
Document current performance metrics as baseline:
- App launch time: 2.3s (cold), 0.8s (warm)
- Memory footprint: 145MB average
- Battery drain: 4%/hour active use
- Network: 2.1MB average session

Name: Beta testing recruitment
Notes:
Recruit 200 beta testers across segments:
- 50 power users
- 100 regular users
- 50 new users

Set up feedback collection via in-app surveys and dedicated Slack channel.

Name: App store listing update
Notes: Update App Store and Play Store listings with new screenshots, feature descriptions, and promotional text. Coordinate with marketing for launch timing.

Name: Implement haptic feedback
Notes: Add haptic feedback for key interactions: button taps, pull-to-refresh, successful actions. Should be subtle and follow platform conventions. Include user preference toggle.

Name: Fix: Profile image upload crash
Notes:
Users experiencing crashes when uploading profile images larger than 5MB. Need to implement image compression before upload and add proper error handling for memory pressure situations.

Crash logs: https://crashlytics.example.com/issue/12345

Affected versions: 3.2.0+
Affected devices: Primarily older devices with <3GB RAM

Name: Fix: Cart total calculation error
Notes: Rounding errors in cart total when applying percentage discounts. Need to implement proper decimal handling using BigDecimal or similar.

Name: Fix: Deep link handling on cold start
Research: AR feature feasibility
Notes: Investigate feasibility of AR try-on feature for product visualization. Evaluate ARKit/ARCore capabilities, development effort, and potential user value. This is exploratory for potential future roadmap inclusion.

Name: Documentation: API integration guide
Notes: Write comprehensive API integration guide for third-party developers. Include authentication, rate limits, webhooks, and code samples in multiple languages.

Name: Implement feature flags system
Notes:
Set up LaunchDarkly or similar for feature flag management. This enables:
- Gradual rollouts
- A/B testing
- Kill switches for problematic features
- Environment-specific configurations

Name: Load testing - API endpoints
Notes:
Load test all critical API endpoints:
- Target: 10,000 concurrent users
- Response time P99 < 500ms
- Error rate < 0.1%

Document results and identify bottlenecks.

Name: Update privacy policy for new features
Implement biometric authentication
Notes: Add Face ID/Touch ID support for iOS and fingerprint/face unlock for Android. Store auth tokens securely in Keychain/Keystore. Provide fallback to PIN/password.

Name: Gradient background performance
Notes: Investigate and optimize gradient background rendering. Currently causing frame drops on older devices. Consider using cached rendered images or simpler alternatives.

Name: Data export functionality
Notes: Implement user data export feature for GDPR compliance. Users should be able to request and download all their data in machine-readable format (JSON). Include audit logging of all exports.

Name: Review third-party SDK licenses
Notes: Audit all third-party SDKs for license compliance. Ensure attribution requirements are met. Flag any SDKs with GPL or other restrictive licenses for legal review.

Name: Session timeout handling
Notes:
Implement graceful session timeout handling:
- Show warning 5 min before expiry
- Allow session extension
- Save draft state before logout
- Smooth re-authentication flow

Name: Skeleton loading screens
Notes: Replace spinner loaders with skeleton screens throughout the app. Provides better perceived performance and matches modern app patterns.

Name: Empty state illustrations
Notes:
Create friendly empty state illustrations for:
- Empty cart
- No search results
- No notifications
- Empty favorites list
- First-time user states

Name: Optimize bundle size
Notes:
Reduce app bundle size by 20%:
- Remove unused dependencies
- Implement tree shaking
- Compress assets
- Use dynamic imports for large features

Current size: 45MB (iOS), 38MB (Android)
Target: <36MB (iOS), <30MB (Android)

Name: Implement app rating prompt
Notes: Add smart app rating prompt that triggers after positive interactions. Follow Apple and Google guidelines for prompt timing. Track prompt impressions and conversion rates.

Name: Fix: Notification badge count sync
Notes: Badge count on app icon not syncing correctly with actual unread notifications. Need to implement proper badge management with server sync.

Name: Design review - dashboard iteration 2
Notes: Second iteration of dashboard design incorporating feedback from stakeholder review. Key changes: simplified metrics display, more prominent quick actions, improved visual hierarchy.

Name: Implement widget customization
Notes: Allow users to customize dashboard by adding, removing, and reordering widgets. Save preferences to user profile for cross-device sync.
